documentation.text:
@dev ERC1155 token with pausable token transfers, minting and burning.
 Useful for scenarios such as preventing trades until the end of an evaluation
 period, or having an emergency switch for freezing all token transfers in the
 event of a large bug.
 _Available since v3.1._

attributes.text:
@dev ERC1155 token with pausable token transfers, minting and burning.
 Useful for scenarios such as preventing trades until the end of an evaluation
 period, or having an emergency switch for freezing all token transfers in the
 event of a large bug.
 _Available since v3.1._

devdoc.details: ERC1155 token with pausable token transfers, minting and burning. Useful for scenarios such as preventing trades until the end of an evaluation period, or having an emergency switch for freezing all token transfers in the event of a large bug. _Available since v3.1._

balanceOf(address,uint256).details: See {IERC1155-balanceOf}. Requirements: - `account` cannot be the zero address.

balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[]).details: See {IERC1155-balanceOfBatch}. Requirements: - `accounts` and `ids` must have the same length.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: See {IERC165-supportsInterface}. Time complexity O(1), guaranteed to always use less than 30 000 gas.
